column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Ramen is great
column2: some say it's not as good as other places and it isn't
column3: but it's still good. Parking is horrendous
column4: and when you do find parking
column5: get ready to stand and wait upwards of an hour to be seated. Once you're seated
column7: the wait is not bad. Would not recommend for a first date or anything like that but not a bad place to go if you have a day or so to kill
